name: Fire Control
description: Fire Control is a game where you have to keep the forest alive for as long as possible. The fire will spread and if you extinguish every fire on the map there will appear a fire at a random location. To extinguish the fire you have 2 helicopters and 2 planes, the plane extinguish in a 5x1 area and the helicopter in a 3x3, the planes and helicopters have a cooldown of 5 second. You can choose them by clicking on the icons or use the hotkeys 1, 2, 3, or 4. Keep at least 30% of the forest alive!
